shops.name: North End Coffee Roasters
shops.description: A specialty coffee roastery and café serving single-origin beans roasted in-house. Known for their expertly crafted pour-overs and espresso drinks in a modern, minimalist setting.

reviews.author: Rashid Sakir
reviews.text: The latte and mocha are excellent. The staff is amazing and very friendly. This is the place to go if you want to treat yourself to good coffee.

reviews.author: Tasneem Islam
reviews.text: North End Coffee is simply the best coffee chain in Dhaka! Their coffee quality is exceptional, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. Plus, the staff is always friendly and attentive. Highly recommend for any coffee lover!

reviews.author: User Review
reviews.text: Great ambience and tasty coffees! Highly recommend this place for chit chatting and work as well!

shops.name: Coffee Holic
shops.address: Level 6, Jamuna Future Park, Ka-244, Progoti Sharani, Kuril, Dhaka 1229, Bangladesh
shops.description: Popular café chain known for their affordable coffee and cozy atmosphere. Great spot for casual meetups with friends or studying.

reviews.author: Sadi Sarkar
reviews.text: Everything is just fantastic. Love the vibes, love the aesthetics, love the food, love the hospitality.

reviews.author: Redwan Ahmed
reviews.text: Really good food, and the ambience is also very good.

reviews.author: Arko Roy
reviews.text: I'm not a great fan of coffee. But since I work at JFP I sometimes drop by. Their desserts are delicious. You can order them with no ice cream. Reasonably priced. The atmosphere is cool. Take your loved ones here.

shops.name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
shops.description: International coffee chain offering a wide variety of coffee drinks and pastries. Consistent quality and comfortable seating make it ideal for both work and leisure.

reviews.author: Kazi Sourav
reviews.text: It's one of the best hangout spot for everyone in Gulshan. Nice ambiance, super friendly and prompt service. Food was delicious.

reviews.author: Syeda Raisa
reviews.text: The environment is really good and very calm and soothing, the food is really very tasty. We must have had multiple items with it and liked it. The stuff was well behaved and the service was really good. So, I must say the place is amazing to hang out with your friends or family.

reviews.author: Md. Alif
reviews.text: A good coffee shop. Nice ambience. Limited menu but very good food. I would rate the foods 5 stars.

shops.name: Café Mango
shops.description: Cozy neighborhood café with a homely vibe. Known for their delicious food alongside quality coffee. Popular among locals and university students.

reviews.author: Sharmin Shapla
reviews.text: Love the menu, very friendly service, food is delicious. A good place to hang out with friends.

reviews.author: M Abdullah
reviews.text: Their Cafe Latte is one of the best in Dhaka. Also, the environment is serene and perfect if you want to relax in a quiet place.

reviews.author: Zarin Rahman
reviews.text: Great atmosphere, good service. Coffee is excellent and reasonably priced. Perfect spot for a quiet afternoon.

shops.name: Gloria Jean's Coffees
shops.address: Bashundhara City Shopping Mall, Level 7, 13/1 Panthapath, Dhaka 1205, Bangladesh
shops.description: International coffee chain located in Bashundhara City. Offers a variety of flavored coffees and comfortable seating. Great place to take a break while shopping.

reviews.author: Mehreen Alam
reviews.text: My favourite place! The service and sitting arrangement everything was so good. The staff is also very cordial and they are very welcoming. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Tahsin Rahman
reviews.text: Nice ambience, good food and coffee. A bit pricey but the quality is worth it. Perfect for a shopping break.

reviews.author: Sadia Khan
reviews.text: Love their flavored coffees! The caramel latte is my favorite. Great service and comfortable seating.

shops.name: Barista Lavazza
shops.address: House 5/A, Block B, Road 23, Banani, Dhaka 1213, Bangladesh
shops.description: Premium Italian coffee experience in the heart of Banani. Serves authentic Lavazza coffee with expert baristas. Elegant interior perfect for business meetings or a quiet coffee break.

reviews.author: Nusaiba Prionti
reviews.text: Calm, soothing atmosphere. Great for work or studying. Coffee quality is excellent and the pastries are fresh. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Ahmed Reza
reviews.text: Good coffee and nice ambience. A bit pricey but worth it for the quality. Perfect spot for a quiet afternoon.

reviews.author: Tasnim Jahan
reviews.text: One of my favorite coffee spots! The Italian espresso is authentic and delicious. Beautiful interior design.

shops.name: Brew & Bites Café
shops.address: House 23, Road 27, Block A, Banani, Dhaka 1213, Bangladesh
shops.description: Modern café specializing in artisan coffee and fresh pastries. Popular brunch spot with a vibrant community atmosphere.

reviews.author: Raisa Ahmed
reviews.text: Great food, cozy atmosphere and friendly staff! The coffee is excellent and the pastries are always fresh. Perfect spot for brunch with friends.

reviews.author: Fahim Hossain
reviews.text: Nice ambience and good coffee. The sandwiches are delicious. A bit crowded on weekends but worth the wait.

reviews.author: Maliha Khan
reviews.text: Love this place! The flat white is consistently good. Great for work or casual meetups. Highly recommended!

shops.name: Crimson Cup Coffee
shops.address: House 25, Road 11, Block H, Banani, Dhaka 1213, Bangladesh
shops.description: American-style coffee house known for award-winning blends and craft coffee. Features a brew bar with hand-poured specialty coffees from around the world. Popular among young professionals and students.

reviews.author: Faiza Rahman
reviews.text: Amazing ambience and delicious coffee! The white mocha is my absolute favorite. Perfect place for studying or working. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Mushfiq Ahmed
reviews.text: One of the best coffee shops in Dhaka! Great atmosphere, excellent coffee, and friendly staff. The cold brew is exceptional!

reviews.author: Nadia Sultana
reviews.text: Cozy place with good coffee. The frozen mocha is really good. Can get crowded on weekends but worth the visit.

shops.name: Crimson Cup Dhanmondi
shops.description: Second branch of Crimson Cup featuring the first brew bar in Dhaka. Known for Ethiopian and Mexican single-origin coffees. Spacious seating perfect for meetings and study sessions.

reviews.author: Fahim Hassan
reviews.text: Love the brew bar! Tried the Ethiopian Sidamo and it was phenomenal. Great ambiance for work.

reviews.author: Sanjida Akter
reviews.text: Spacious and comfortable. Coffee quality is consistently good. The cappuccino is my favorite.

reviews.author: Rahat Khan
reviews.text: Professional service and excellent coffee. The hand-pour coffees are worth trying. A bit pricey but worth it.

shops.name: Crimson Cup Uttara
shops.address: Quantum Mostofa Tower, 3rd Floor, Sector 13, Uttara
shops.description: Largest Crimson Cup location in Dhaka. Features nitro cold brew on tap and a dedicated quiet room for studying. Ample parking and spacious interior make it ideal for groups.

reviews.author: Mehedi Hasan
reviews.text: Best coffee spot in Uttara! The nitro cold brew is amazing. Quiet room is perfect for studying.

reviews.author: Tahsin Ahmed
reviews.text: Spacious and well-designed. Good parking facilities. Coffee is excellent as always.

reviews.author: Lamia Karim
reviews.text: Love this place! Great for meetings and study sessions. The staff is very professional.

shops.name: Butlers Chocolate Café
shops.description: Premium Irish chocolate café offering chocolate-infused coffees and decadent desserts. Known for rich hot chocolate and chocolate fondant. Luxurious ambiance perfect for special occasions.

reviews.author: Ayesha Rahman
reviews.text: Heaven for chocolate lovers! The hot chocolate is incredibly rich and velvety. Expensive but worth every taka.

reviews.author: Shahriar Kabir
reviews.text: Best chocolate café in Dhaka. The chocolate fondant is to die for. Elegant ambiance, perfect for dates.

reviews.author: Nadia Islam
reviews.text: Luxurious experience. Coffee quality is excellent and the desserts are divine. Service is impeccable.

shops.name: The White Canary Café
shops.description: Trendy café on North Avenue offering signature coffees and North American all-day brunch. Known for in-house roasted coffee, delectable cakes, and stunning rooftop views. Popular brunch destination.

reviews.author: Tamanna Sultana
reviews.text: Amazing brunch spot! The waffles are the best I've had in Dhaka. Coffee is excellent too. Love the rooftop seating!

reviews.author: Rahim Ahmed
reviews.text: Perfect ambiance and great food. Their in-house roasted coffee is phenomenal. Highly recommend for weekend brunch.

reviews.author: Sadia Haque
reviews.text: Beautiful café with excellent service. The cakes and pastries are delicious. A bit pricey but worth it.

shops.name: Tabaq Coffee
shops.description: Popular mall café known for exceptional hazelnut latte and iced beverages. Affordable prices and consistent quality make it a favorite among shoppers. Known for excellent customer service.

reviews.author: Fariha Ahmed
reviews.text: Best hazelnut latte in Dhaka! Service is exceptional - they really care about customer experience. Great place to rest during shopping.

reviews.author: Mahbub Rahman
reviews.text: Good coffee at reasonable prices. The ice blended mocha is refreshing. Limited seating but worth the wait.

reviews.author: Lamia Hassan
reviews.text: Consistently good quality. Their iced caramel latte is amazing. Staff is always friendly and welcoming.

shops.name: Hobnob Café
shops.description: Cozy neighborhood café with relaxed atmosphere. Known for good coffee at affordable prices and comfortable seating. Popular spot for students and freelancers to work.

reviews.author: Rizwan Khan
reviews.text: Perfect place to work remotely. Good WiFi, comfortable seating, and decent coffee at reasonable prices.

reviews.author: Maliha Tasnim
reviews.text: Relaxed vibe and friendly staff. Coffee is good, not exceptional but definitely worth the price. Great for studying.

reviews.author: Tanvir Ahmed
reviews.text: Cozy atmosphere. Good for long work sessions. The cappuccino is consistently good.

shops.name: Gusto Bistro & Coffee
shops.description: Upscale bistro and coffee house near the airport. Known for quality coffee and extensive food menu. Modern ambiance perfect for business meetings and family gatherings.

reviews.author: Shafiq Rahman
reviews.text: Excellent food and coffee. Perfect location near the airport. Great for pre-flight coffee or business meetings.

reviews.author: Nusrat Jahan
reviews.text: Modern and spacious. Coffee is good and the pasta is excellent. A bit expensive but worth it.

reviews.author: Kamal Hossain
reviews.text: One of my favorite places in Uttara. Great ambiance, good food, and excellent coffee. Highly recommended.

shops.name: Madchef
shops.description: Trendy urban café known for bold experiments in food and coffee. Popular with younger crowd. Features unique drinks like caffeinated milkshakes and nitro coffee. Vibrant atmosphere.

reviews.author: Sami Ahmed
reviews.text: Love the vibe here! The nitro coffee is unlike anything else in Dhaka. Food is also amazing.

reviews.author: Farah Tabassum
reviews.text: Perfect hangout spot! The caffeinated milkshake is incredible. Great music and atmosphere.

reviews.author: Rafid Hassan
reviews.text: Urban and trendy. Coffee is experimental and unique. Great place for young crowd. A bit noisy but fun!

shops.name: George's Café
shops.description: Serene café popular with professionals and students. Known for quiet atmosphere and quality coffee. Specializes in espresso-based drinks and Italian coffee culture. Study-friendly environment.

reviews.author: Tahmid Rahman
reviews.text: Perfect study café! Quiet, peaceful, and great coffee. The espresso con panna is excellent.

reviews.author: Nadia Ahmed
reviews.text: Calm atmosphere, good for work. Coffee quality is consistently good. The affogato is a must-try!

reviews.author: Imran Hossain
reviews.text: My go-to place for focused work. Great WiFi, comfortable seating, and excellent coffee.

shops.name: Kiva Han
shops.description: Inspired by one of the world's first coffeehouses. Blends tradition with modernity. Known for Turkish coffee and cappuccino royale. Rich historical ambiance with contemporary comfort.

reviews.author: Fahim Hassan
reviews.text: Unique experience! The Turkish coffee is authentic and delicious. Love the historical theme and ambiance.

reviews.author: Sanjida Akter
reviews.text: Beautiful café with a story. The cappuccino royale is exceptional. Perfect blend of tradition and modernity.

reviews.author: Rahat Khan
reviews.text: Interesting concept and great execution. Coffee is excellent. A bit pricey but worth experiencing.

shops.name: Beans & Aroma Coffees
shops.description: Cozy coffee shop offering wide variety of coffees, teas and pastries. In-house roasted coffee in relaxed atmosphere. Known for vanilla latte and French press coffee. Affordable prices.

reviews.author: Mehedi Hasan
reviews.text: Good coffee at reasonable prices. The vanilla latte is smooth and well-balanced. Nice place to relax.

reviews.author: Tahsin Ahmed
reviews.text: Love their French press coffee! Fresh beans and great aroma. Staff is knowledgeable and friendly.

reviews.author: Lamia Karim
reviews.text: Cozy and inviting. Coffee quality is good. The pastries are fresh and delicious.

shops.name: Peyala
shops.description: Popular local coffee shop offering in-house roasted coffee in relaxed setting. Wide variety of coffees, teas and pastries. Known for friendly atmosphere and reasonable prices. Community favorite.

reviews.author: Ayesha Rahman
reviews.text: Neighborhood gem! Great coffee at affordable prices. The staff remembers regulars' orders. Love this place!

reviews.author: Shahriar Kabir
reviews.text: Cozy atmosphere and good coffee. Perfect for casual meetups. The latte art is impressive!

reviews.author: Nadia Islam
reviews.text: My favorite local café! Consistent quality and warm service. The cappuccino is always perfect.

shops.name: Crème De La Crème Café
shops.description: Upscale café known for in-house roasted coffee and exquisite cakes and pastries. Elegant atmosphere perfect for afternoon tea. Famous for French-inspired desserts and specialty coffee.

reviews.author: Tamanna Sultana
reviews.text: The cakes are absolutely divine! Best pastries in Dhaka. Coffee is excellent too. A bit pricey but worth every bite.

reviews.author: Rahim Ahmed
reviews.text: Elegant and sophisticated. Perfect for special occasions. Their éclairs and macarons are exceptional.

reviews.author: Sadia Haque
reviews.text: Beautiful presentation and delicious food. Coffee is very good. Great place for afternoon tea with friends.

shops.name: Arabika Coffee House
shops.description: Rustic-themed café providing unique retreat from daily hustle. Warm and calm atmosphere perfect for long work sessions or casual conversations. Known for comfortable seating and good WiFi.

reviews.author: Fariha Ahmed
reviews.text: My favorite café in Bashundhara! Rustic decor is so cozy. Can spend hours here working. Coffee is good too!

reviews.author: Mahbub Rahman
reviews.text: Perfect place to unwind. The atmosphere is warm and inviting. Great for reading or catching up with friends.

reviews.author: Lamia Hassan
reviews.text: Calm and relaxed vibe. Good coffee at reasonable prices. The seating is very comfortable.

shops.name: The Second Cup
shops.description: Canadian coffee chain known for premium coffee and delicious cakes. Famous for red velvet cake and specialty lattes. Elegant yet cozy environment perfect for meetings or leisure.

reviews.author: Rizwan Khan
reviews.text: The red velvet cake is incredible! Best I've tasted in Dhaka. Coffee is also excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Maliha Tasnim
reviews.text: Love this place! Great coffee and amazing desserts. The atmosphere is perfect for both work and relaxation.

reviews.author: Tanvir Ahmed
reviews.text: Quality coffee and cakes. A bit expensive but worth it. Service is professional and friendly.

shops.name: Coffee Republic
shops.description: Elegant yet cozy environment for discerning coffee drinkers. Known for quality espresso and comfortable seating. Popular among professionals for business meetings and casual gatherings.

reviews.author: Shafiq Rahman
reviews.text: Good place for business meetings. Coffee is decent and atmosphere is professional yet relaxed.

reviews.author: Nusrat Jahan
reviews.text: Love the ambiance! Perfect balance of elegance and comfort. The cappuccino is consistently good.

reviews.author: Kamal Hossain
reviews.text: Reliable coffee shop. Good quality at reasonable prices. WiFi is fast and seating is comfortable.

shops.name: Coffee World
shops.description: Casual coffee shop good for passing time. Serves good coffee with reasonable prices and variety of snacks. Popular spot among students and locals for casual hangouts.

reviews.author: Sami Ahmed
reviews.text: Good place to hang out. Coffee is decent and prices are reasonable. The snacks are tasty too.

reviews.author: Farah Tabassum
reviews.text: Casual and relaxed atmosphere. Good for meeting friends. WiFi works well for light work.

reviews.author: Rafid Hassan
reviews.text: My regular spot! Friendly staff and consistent quality. The iced coffee is refreshing.

shops.name: Segafredo Espresso
shops.description: Italian coffee chain with international standards. Known for authentic Italian espresso and warm atmosphere. Perfect for focused work or casual meetups with friends. Professional service.

reviews.author: Tahmid Rahman
reviews.text: Authentic Italian coffee! The espresso is strong and flavorful. Great atmosphere for work or meetings.

reviews.author: Nadia Ahmed
reviews.text: Best Italian coffee in Dhaka. The cappuccino is perfection. Professional service and comfortable seating.

reviews.author: Imran Hossain
reviews.text: High quality coffee and professional atmosphere. A bit pricey but delivers on quality.

shops.name: Café Social at InterContinental
shops.description: Premium hotel café offering luxury coffee experience. Known for exceptional service and high-quality beverages. Elegant ambiance perfect for business meetings and special occasions. Premium pricing.

reviews.author: Ayesha Rahman
reviews.text: Luxurious experience! The coffee is exceptional and service is impeccable. Perfect for important business meetings.

reviews.author: Shahriar Kabir
reviews.text: Best hotel café in Dhaka. Excellent coffee and pastries. The ambiance is sophisticated and elegant.

reviews.author: Nadia Islam
reviews.text: Premium quality everything. Expensive but worth it for special occasions. Service is world-class.

shops.name: North End Borak Mehnur
shops.description: North End Coffee Roasters branch in Uttara. Known for exceptional single-origin coffee roasted in-house. Modern minimalist setting perfect for coffee enthusiasts. Consistently excellent quality.

reviews.author: Fahim Hassan
reviews.text: Best coffee in Uttara! The pour-over is expertly crafted. Love coming here for my morning coffee fix.

reviews.author: Sanjida Akter
reviews.text: Consistently excellent! The flat white is perfectly balanced. Great place to work with reliable WiFi.

reviews.author: Rahat Khan
reviews.text: Top quality coffee and professional baristas. The cold brew is amazing. Highly recommend!

shops.name: North End LK Tower 2
shops.description: Flagship North End location at LK Tower 2. Premium specialty coffee roastery and café. Known for expertly crafted drinks and extensive single-origin selection. Modern, spacious, and always busy.

reviews.author: Tamanna Sultana
reviews.text: The best coffee shop in Dhaka, hands down! Every drink is expertly prepared. The cortado is perfection!

reviews.author: Rahim Ahmed
reviews.text: Coffee lover's paradise! The baristas are skilled and knowledgeable. Try their single-origin pour-overs!

reviews.author: Sadia Haque
reviews.text: Consistently the best. Great atmosphere, excellent coffee, friendly staff. My favorite café in Dhaka!

shops.name: Café Twenty Two
shops.description: Trendy neighborhood café with artistic vibe. Known for good coffee, creative food menu, and Instagram-worthy decor. Popular hangout spot for creative professionals and young crowd.

reviews.author: Rizwan Khan
reviews.text: Love the artistic vibe! Great place for creative work. The latte art is beautiful and coffee tastes great too.

reviews.author: Maliha Tasnim
reviews.text: Trendy and Instagram-worthy! Coffee is good and the food menu is creative. Perfect for hanging out.

reviews.author: Tanvir Ahmed
reviews.text: My favorite spot in Banani! Good coffee, great atmosphere, and friendly staff. Highly recommended!

shops.name: Urban Coffee Roasters
shops.description: Modern coffee roastery in Mirpur bringing quality coffee to the area. Known for fresh roasted beans and reasonable prices. Growing chain with urban aesthetic and good WiFi.

reviews.author: Shafiq Rahman
reviews.text: Great addition to Mirpur! Finally a good coffee shop in the area. Coffee is fresh and prices are reasonable.

reviews.author: Nusrat Jahan
reviews.text: Love this place! Modern vibe and good coffee. Perfect for studying or working. WiFi is fast.

reviews.author: Kamal Hossain
reviews.text: Good quality coffee at affordable prices. The cold brew is excellent. Happy to have this in Mirpur!

shops.name: Brew Station
shops.description: Local coffee chain focusing on quality and affordability. Known for consistent coffee and friendly service. Popular among students and young professionals. Good place for casual meetings.

reviews.author: Sami Ahmed
reviews.text: Reliable coffee shop in Uttara. Good quality at reasonable prices. Staff is always friendly.

reviews.author: Farah Tabassum
reviews.text: My regular spot! Consistent quality and good atmosphere. The cappuccino is always well-made.

reviews.author: Rafid Hassan
reviews.text: Good coffee and nice ambiance. Perfect for studying or casual meetups. WiFi works well.

shops.name: Café Nostalgia
shops.description: Retro-themed café with vintage decor and nostalgic atmosphere. Known for classic coffee drinks and comfort food. Popular among older crowd and families. Relaxed and homely vibe.

reviews.author: Tahmid Rahman
reviews.text: Love the vintage vibe! Takes you back in time. Coffee is good and the food is comforting. Great place to relax.

reviews.author: Nadia Ahmed
reviews.text: Charming atmosphere with retro decor. Coffee is decent and prices are reasonable. Perfect for family visits.

reviews.author: Imran Hossain
reviews.text: Nostalgic and cozy! Great place to spend time with friends. The hot chocolate is excellent.

shops.name: Espresso Lab
shops.description: Specialty coffee lab focusing on coffee science and precision brewing. Known for experimental drinks and coffee education. Popular among serious coffee enthusiasts. Modern laboratory aesthetic.

reviews.author: Fahim Hassan
reviews.text: Coffee geek's paradise! They take coffee seriously here. Love the experimental approach. Best espresso in Dhaka!

reviews.author: Sanjida Akter
reviews.text: Fascinating place! The baristas are knowledgeable and passionate. Try their signature experimental drinks.

reviews.author: Rahat Khan
reviews.text: High-quality coffee with scientific approach. A bit pricey but worth it for the experience and education.

shops.name: Mocha Moments
shops.description: Cozy café specializing in mocha and chocolate-based coffee drinks. Known for dessert pairings and sweet treats. Popular date spot and casual hangout. Warm and inviting atmosphere.

reviews.author: Ayesha Rahman
reviews.text: Perfect for chocolate lovers! The mocha is incredibly rich and delicious. Great place for dates!

reviews.author: Shahriar Kabir
reviews.text: Cozy and romantic atmosphere. Coffee is good and the desserts are excellent. Reasonably priced.

reviews.author: Nadia Islam
reviews.text: Love this place! The white chocolate mocha is heavenly. Perfect spot for catching up with friends.

shops.name: Latte Lounge
shops.description: Upscale lounge-style café known for premium lattes and comfortable seating. Features extensive latte menu with creative flavors. Popular business meeting spot. Professional atmosphere.

reviews.author: Tamanna Sultana
reviews.text: Best lattes in Dhaka! The lavender latte is unique and delicious. Professional atmosphere for meetings.

reviews.author: Rahim Ahmed
reviews.text: Upscale and comfortable. Great for business meetings. Coffee is high quality. A bit expensive.

reviews.author: Sadia Haque
reviews.text: Love the lounge vibe! Comfortable seating and excellent lattes. The rose latte is must-try!

shops.name: Bean There Café
shops.description: Friendly neighborhood café with pun-inspired name. Known for welcoming atmosphere and consistent coffee. Popular local hangout with regular customers. Affordable prices and good service.

reviews.author: Rizwan Khan
reviews.text: Friendly local spot! Staff knows regulars by name. Coffee is consistently good. Great neighborhood café.

reviews.author: Maliha Tasnim
reviews.text: Love the welcoming vibe! Perfect for daily coffee fix. Prices are very reasonable.

reviews.author: Tanvir Ahmed
reviews.text: Solid neighborhood café. Good coffee, friendly service, and comfortable atmosphere.
